definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Now the latest intelligence evaluations were being announced worldwide, nearly in real time.
sentences.chinese: 現在最新的情報分析實時地向全世界公佈。

sentences.english: The military intelligence prediction is a dynamic process of intelligence analysis and prediction.
sentences.chinese: 軍事情報預測是一個動態的情報分析與預測過程。

sentences.english: I am very scared about the test.
sentences.chinese: 報分試來了，我感到十分緊張。
